verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the faith <S%G4102><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> elect, <S%G1588><s%> and the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is after <S%G2596><s%> godliness; <S%G2150><s%>

In hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that cannot <S%G893><s%> lie, <S%G893><s%> promised <S%G1861><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G166><s%> began; <S%G4253><s%>

But has in due <S%G2398><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> his word <S%G3056><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> preaching, <S%G2782><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is committed <S%G4100><s%> to me according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

To Titus, <S%G5103><s%> my own <S%G1103><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the common <S%G2839><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Savior. <S%G4990><s%>

For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> left <S%G2641><s%> I you in Crete, <S%G2914><s%> that you should set <S%G1930><s%> in order <S%G1930><s%> the things that are wanting, <S%G3007><s%> and ordain <S%G2525><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> as I had appointed <S%G1299><s%> you:

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> be blameless, <S%G410><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> not accused <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2724><s%> of riot <S%G810><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unruly. <S%G506><s%>

For a bishop <S%G1985><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be blameless, <S%G410><s%> as the steward <S%G3622><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> not self-willed, <S%G829><s%> not soon <S%G3711><s%> angry, <S%G3711><s%> not given <S%G3943><s%> to wine, <S%G3943><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> striker, <S%G4131><s%> not given to filthy <S%G150><s%> lucre; <S%G146><s%>
But a lover <S%G5382><s%> of hospitality, <S%G5382><s%> a lover <S%G5358><s%> of good <S%G5358><s%> men, sober, <S%G4998><s%> just, <S%G1342><s%> holy, <S%G3741><s%> temperate; <S%G1468><s%>

Holding <S%G472><s%> fast <S%G472><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> as he has been taught, <S%G1322><s%> that he may be able <S%G1415><s%> by sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> and to convince <S%G1651><s%> the disputers. <S%G483><s%>
For there are many <S%G4183><s%> unruly <S%G506><s%> and vain <S%G3151><s%> talkers <S%G3151><s%> and deceivers, <S%G5423><s%> specially <S%G3122><s%> they of the circumcision: <S%G4061><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouths <S%G1993><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be stopped, <S%G1993><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> subvert <S%G396><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> houses, <S%G3624><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> not, for filthy <S%G150><s%> lucre's <S%G2771><s%> sake.

One <S%G5100><s%> of themselves, <S%G846><s%> even a prophet <S%G4396><s%> of their own, <S%G2398><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> The Cretians <S%G2912><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> liars, <S%G5583><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> slow <S%G692><s%> bellies. <S%G1064><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%> Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> rebuke <S%G1651><s%> them sharply, <S%G664><s%> that they may be sound <S%G5198><s%> in the faith; <S%G4102><s%>
Not giving heed <S%G4337><s%> to Jewish <S%G2451><s%> fables, <S%G3454><s%> and commandments <S%G1785><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> that turn <S%G654><s%> from the truth. <S%G225><s%>

To the pure <S%G2513><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are pure: <S%G2513><s%> but to them that are defiled <S%G3392><s%> and unbelieving <S%G571><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> pure; <S%G2513><s%> but even <S%G2532><s%> their mind <S%G3563><s%> and conscience <S%G4893><s%> is defiled. <S%G3392><s%>

They profess <S%G3670><s%> that they know <S%G1492><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> but in works <S%G2041><s%> they deny <S%G720><s%> him, being <S%G5607><s%> abominable, <S%G947><s%> and disobedient, <S%G545><s%> and to every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> reprobate. <S%G96><s%>
